basic_punic_wax.title: Foundation Recipe

ingredients.potash_solution: 100 g potash (K2CO3) dissolved in 0.5 L hot distilled water
ingredients.honey_solution: 0.5 L hot honey/sugar solution (100 g honey or sugar + distilled water)

instructions: Melt beeswax in large pot (minimum 10 L capacity)
Slowly add dissolved potash solution while stirring (small amounts to prevent overflow)
Stir continuously - mixture will become frothy
Add hot honey/sugar solution while stirring
Gradually add cold water during continuous stirring
Heat briefly, then cover and cool while stirring occasionally
Store in airtight containers - keeps 2-3 years when cool
